task.title: Task: Changing chart location
task.shortdesc: A chart on a worksheet can easily be moved to another location.

context.p: You can create a chart on the same worksheet as the data. This is an embedded chart. You can also display add a chart to a separate sheet that only contains a chart, a chart sheet. An embedded chart on a worksheet can be moved by dragging it to another place, but you can also move it to a chart sheet. Both methods are practiced in this task.

step.cmd: Press the left mouse button and drag the chart to the desired place.

info.note: If you hold down the Alt key while dragging the chart will snap to the gridlines of the worksheet.

step.cmd: Click outside the chart in the worksheet to deselect.
Select the chart again and choose Design Move Chart (group Location) .
Select New sheet, give the name for the new sheet, then click OK.

steps.stepsection: Now move the chart back to the worksheet.

step.cmd: Select the chart in the chart sheet.

step.stepresult: The dialog box Move chart appears.

step.cmd: Select Object in, and choose the worksheet on which the chart should be embedded, and then click OK.
step.stepresult: The worksheet with the embedded chart is shown and the chart sheet has been deleted.
